summary: you can get your app current push config setting through this api
description: you can get your app current push config setting through this api

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://open.admin.shopee.io/api/v2/push/get_lost_push_message?partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warning
schema.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: push_message_list
schema.description: Returns the earliest 100 lost push messages that were lost within 3 days of the current time and not confirmed to have been consumed.

schema.name: shop_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. If it's a partner level push (such as code: 1, 2, 12), shop_id will not be returned.

schema.name: code
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a push notification.

schema.name: timestamp
schema.description: Timestamp that indicates the message was lost.

schema.name: has_next_page
schema.description: This is to indicate whether the lost push message to be consumed is more than 100. If this value is true, you may need to continue calling to get the remaining lost push messages to be consumed.

schema.name: last_message_id
schema.description: Specifies the end entry of data returned in the current call.
